Package seng202.group2.view.graphs

Class BarGraph

java.lang.Object
seng202.group2.view.graphs.Graph
seng202.group2.view.graphs.BarGraph
All Implemented Interfaces:
Plottable
public class BarGraph
extends Graph
implements Plottable
A Graph class that generates a Bar chart, plotting either two DataCategory subtypes against each other, or a single DataCategory subtype against the count of crime records which take on each value for that DataCategory. Selecting between these two behaviours is done using the internal enumeration Mode.
Author:
Connor Dunlop
